E

ENVIRONMENT_PREFIX - Static variable in class se.jguru.nazgul.core.parser.api.agent.DefaultParserAgent
Prefix indicating that a token replacement value should be acquired from environment settings using System.getenv("someKey"), given that the token is ${env:someKey}

H

HOST_ADDRESS - Static variable in class se.jguru.nazgul.core.parser.api.agent.HostNameParserAgent
Token key indicating that the replacement value should be acquired using the local host's canonical name, i.e: InetAddress.getLocalHost().getHostAddress().
HOST_CANONICAL_NAME - Static variable in class se.jguru.nazgul.core.parser.api.agent.HostNameParserAgent
Token key indicating that the replacement value should be acquired using the local host's canonical name, i.e: InetAddress.getLocalHost().getCanonicalHostName().
HOST_NAME - Static variable in class se.jguru.nazgul.core.parser.api.agent.HostNameParserAgent
Token key indicating that the replacement value should be acquired using the local host's canonical name, i.e: InetAddress.getLocalHost().getHostName().

Initializes this TokenParser, indicating that the supplied TokenDefinitions should be used to acquire charSequences for start and end of tokens, as well as a pattern to recognize a Token.

SYSPROP_PREFIX - Static variable in class se.jguru.nazgul.core.parser.api.agent.DefaultParserAgent
Prefix indicating that a token replacement value should be acquired from Java System Properties using System.getProperty("someKey"), given that the token is ${sysprop:someKey}

TokenDefinitions - Interface in se.jguru.nazgul.core.parser.api
Specification for how to identify tokens (within text), as well as how to get the actual name from the token when a Pattern match is found.
TokenParser - Interface in se.jguru.nazgul.core.parser.api
Specification for a Parser that recognizes String tokens, and offers substituting values for the token placeholders.
